sec1.title: Gyeongbokgung Starlight Tour
sec1.cnt1: The door to the deepest part of Gyeongbokgung Palace opens
sec1.cnt2: Enjoy royal food experience and traditional performances in the Oeso kitchen
sec1.cnt3: Go on a starlight walk with a professional commentator
sec1.box3_1: Gyeongbokgung Palace, Sojubang, and the northern palace area
sec1.box5_1: Starlight Walk, Doseok Surasang, Food Composition

sec2.title: Main Program
sec2.box1_1: You will stop by the palace's kitchen, 'Sojubang', and taste the 12 dishes that the king of Joseon ate
sec2.box2_1: While eating the delicious surasang, the Korean traditional music performance will be held together and it will be good night
sec2.box3_1: You can tour the northern part of Gyeongbokgung Palace and enjoy the restored Hyangwonjeong Pavilion in a tranquil atmosphere
sec2.box4_1: Both traditional Korean clothes and daily hanboks are free to watch. Top (jacket) and bottom (skirt, pants) are standard

sec3.title: Gyeongbokgung Palace Event
sec3.box1: 'The Palace that the artist loved' is an invited performance that conveys the beauty of the palace with artists. On an autumn night, we invite you to Jipokjae in Gyeongbokgung Palace with a special melody.
sec3.box2: 'The story of the palace in pansori' is a creative pansori performance that tells the story of the persistent vitality of the palace and those who remember it repeatedly
sec3.box3: There is a special walk with the royal family at Gyeongbokgung Palace twice a day. Enjoy the daily life of the palace during the Joseon Dynasty by walking with the king and queen, the crown prince and the crown prince
sec3.box4: Based on the contents of the Annals of the Joseon Dynasty, it is an experience program designed to enjoy royal snacks and royal tea that the actual king ate today

sec4.title: Gyeongbokgung Community
sec4.not1: Special time faced at Gyeongbokgung Palace
sec4.not2: Reproduction and experience of daily life in the palace
sec4.not3: The Palace that the artist loved
sec4.not5: The story of the Palace in Pansori
